summary: At the behest of local revolutionaries, a mercenary enlists four specialists in various combat styles to help him rob a Mexican Army train carrying $500,000 in gold.
cast: Peter Graves|James Daly|Bud Spencer|Nino Castelnuovo|Tetsurô Tanba|Claudio Gora|Carlo Alighiero|Giacomo Rossi Stuart|Dan Sturkie|José Torres|Marino Masé|Annabella Andreoli|Daniela Giordano|Artemio Antonini|Fortunato Arena|Bruno Ariè|Luigi Bonos|Adriana Bruno|Omero Capanna|Dante Cleri|Gildo Di Marco|Alberigo Donadeo|Paolo Figlia|Lina Franchi|Alba Maiolini|Antonio Monselesan|Franco Pasquetto|Osiride Pevarello|Angelo Susani|Don Taylor|Pietro Torrisi|Franco Ukmar|Sergio Ukmar|Steffen Zacharias
keywords: italo western|zapata western|gold train robbery|1910s|bandit gang
title: Un ejército de cinco hombres
